recipeDescription: A great recipe to test our basic functionality!
ingredients1:
8 ounce all-purpose flour, plus more for dusting
1/2 ounce sugar
1 teaspoon kosher salt
8 ounce unsalted butter, cold
4 ounce cold tap water
ingredients2:
3 eggs
3/4 cup sugar
1/2 teaspoon salt
3/4 teaspoon ginger
1 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
3/8 teaspoon nutmeg
3/8 teaspoon clove
1 1/2 cup pumpkin
3/4 cup evaporated milk, or 1 1/4 cups milk
directions1:
Whisk flour, sugar, and salt together in a medium bowl.
Make the Layers.
Using as much flour as needed, roll one piece into a 14-inch circle.
